questions.question: What is Nile Brands?
questions.answer: Nile Brands is an online marketplace that connects Egyptian brands with customers.

questions.question: Who can use Nile Brands?
questions.answer: Both customers and brand owners can use the platform to buy and sell products.

questions.question: How do I create an account?
questions.answer: Click on 'Sign Up', enter your details, and verify your email.

questions.question: Is there a mobile app for Nile Brands?
questions.answer: Yes, you can download our app from the App Store or Google Play.

questions.question: Is Nile Brands free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, customers can browse and purchase for free. Brand owners may have subscription plans for premium features.

questions.question: Can I delete my account?
questions.answer: Yes, go to account settings and select 'Delete Account'. This action is irreversible.

questions.question: How do I place an order?
questions.answer: Add items to your cart and proceed to checkout.

questions.question: Can I cancel my order?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your order before it is shipped from the 'My Orders' section.

questions.question: What happens if my order is delayed?
questions.answer: You will receive a notification if your order is delayed. Contact support for assistance.

questions.question: Can I modify my order after placing it?
questions.answer: Once an order is placed, modifications are not allowed. You may cancel and reorder.

questions.question: Do I need an account to place an order?
questions.answer: Yes, an account is required to track your order and manage payments securely.

questions.question: What payment methods are available?
questions.answer: We accept credit/debit cards and PayPal.

questions.question: Is my payment information secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we use encrypted transactions for security.

questions.question: Can I get a refund?
questions.answer: Refunds are available for eligible orders based on our refund policy.

questions.question: Do you offer cash on delivery?
questions.answer: Currently, we do not support cash on delivery.

questions.question: Are there any hidden fees?
questions.answer: No, all applicable fees are displayed at checkout before payment.

questions.question: How do I add a new product?
questions.answer: Go to your dashboard, click 'Add Product', and enter the required details.

questions.question: Can I edit my product details?
questions.answer: Yes, you can edit your product details from your dashboard at any time.

questions.question: How do I delete a product listing?
questions.answer: Go to your product list and select 'Delete' for the product you want to remove.

questions.question: Can I offer discounts on my products?
questions.answer: Yes, you can set discounts from your dashboard under 'Promotions'.

questions.question: How many products can I list?
questions.answer: There is no limit for standard users. Premium members get additional promotional tools.

questions.question: How long does delivery take?
questions.answer: Delivery times vary depending on your location but typically take 3-7 business days.

questions.question: Can I track my order?
questions.answer: Yes, go to 'My Orders' and check the status of your shipment.

questions.question: What happens if my package is lost?
questions.answer: If your package is lost, contact our support team for assistance.

questions.question: Do you ship internationally?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping for select products.

questions.question: Can I change my shipping address after ordering?
questions.answer: If your order has not shipped yet, you can update your address in 'My Orders'.

questions.question: How do I contact customer support?
questions.answer: You can reach our support team via the 'Help Center' on our website.

questions.question: Is there a chatbot available?
questions.answer: Yes, our chatbot can assist you with frequently asked questions and support requests.

questions.question: How do I report a problem with my order?
questions.answer: Go to 'My Orders', select the order, and click 'Report Issue'.

questions.question: Can I request a callback from support?
questions.answer: Yes, you can request a callback through the 'Help Center'.

questions.question: What are support hours?
questions.answer: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you.
